reqs:
Pre-reqs: (At least 72% average in the preceding 30 credits and permission of a faculty member who is prepared to supervise the investigation.)
Min. GPA requirement of 72% on most recent 30 credits.
Students must see PSYC Undergrad. Advisor for registration.
courseName: Directed Studies in Biopsychology - DIR STUD BIOPSYC
description: Directed investigation of an experimental problem requiring a written report of the findings.
